attributes.action: remove Lord Mandelson Secretary of State for Business, Innovation & Skills from that position because he cannot do a good job when he is not allowed to be critical of the costs of European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lord Mandelson has a large Pension from the EU which he can only receive if he is not critical of the EU's actions in anyway. How can he can be critical of the EU (admin costs etc)in its various cost to business when his EU pension relies upon the fact that he has to be pro EU in everything.
